decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted 5th April 2017 and numbered A555-1, GBW 560/4 specification, Duct specification pages 1 and 2, Centrifugal fan specification pages 1-4, Activated carbon filter specification pages 1 and 2, and PTAL data pages 1 and 2, and submitted 25th May 2017 and numbered A555-2a and 3a, and Design and Access Statement, therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The scheme of extract ventilation shown on the approved drawings and accompanying specifications shall be carried out before any part of the development hereby permitted is occupied and maintained in accordance with the manufacturers' specification thereafter

Condition : 4 - The use shall not commence until not less than two 1100 litre galvanised steel bins have been made available on site within the area for refuse storage shown on the approved plans, together with facilities for the separation and safe storage of glass, metal, plastics, cardboard, food waste and other recyclable materials which shall then be collected and taken to a suitable facility for recycling.  The storage area and bins shall be kept permanently and no waste shall be stored outside the site or other than in the identified storage area.  Non-recyclable and perishable waste shall be removed from site no less frequently than once a week.  Waste shall be removed as soon as the bins become full if this is earlier than the time of the normal collections, unless additional covered and enclosed bins have been provided and stored inside the building and are thereafter made permanently available for the on-site storage of refuse and waste.
Condition : 5 - The opening hours of the premises shall be as follows: Sunday to Thursday: 10:00 am to 11:00 pm and Friday, Saturday and Public Holidays: 10:00 am to 11:30 pm.
Condition : 6 - The premises shall not be used for the sale of hot food for consumption off of the premises.
description: Change of use of ground and first floor No.49 recruitment agency (A2) and first floors of No's 47 and part of 51 to a restaurant (A3)
